box.text: Gridless Combat Tactical affairs such as movement are best handled on a grid, but for players who prefer the wargame type of movement, or who do not want to be tied to a grid-like movement, this variant rule gives them options.

item.text: 5 feet in game is equivalent to 1 inch, and the recommendedmeasure is on hand, and string and circular cutouts with 1 inch notations. All ranges are rounded up to the nearest inch, when needed.

Grenades, explosives, and any weapons with a blast radius workblast radius will be a circle 1 inch across, a 10' radius will have a circle 2 inches across, etc). The diameter of the explosive must only touch the miniature in order for it to be affected. For the purpose of this variant rule, wounding radius is removed.

All creatures sized Medium and less should be able to fit intodiameter circle, Huge creatures will fit into a 3 inch diameter circle, Gargantuan creatures will fit into a 4 inch diameter circle, and Colossal creatures will fit into a 5 inch or larger circle.
